member.name: T:Audis.KnowledgeEnrichers.Contract.V1.IKnowledgeEnricher
member.summary: Takes some knowledge and returns inherited knowledge.

member.name: M:Audis.KnowledgeEnrichers.Contract.V1.IKnowledgeEnricher.EnrichKnowledgeAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection{Audis.KnowledgeEnrichers.Contract.V1.KnowledgeDto},System.Boolean,Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject)
member.summary: Takes some knowledge and returns only the inherited knowlege if the knowledge enricher has anything to add for the given knowledge.
member.param: The knowledge used as starting point for inheriting knowledge.
if the enricher is called when starting the interrogation.
Optional configuration for the knowledge enricher.
member.returns: Returns the inherited knowledge or an empty list.
